qas.question: In addition to the Mayflower Theatre, what's Southampton's other big venue for live music?
What legendary band with a color in its name has played at the Guildhall?
What orchestra with a name that starts with "B" has played at the Guildhall?
What choir from the area has sung at the Guildhall?

context: Southampton has two large live music venues, the Mayflower Theatre (formerly the Gaumont Theatre) and <a0_0>the Guildhall<a0_0/>. The Guildhall has seen concerts from a wide range of popular artists including <a1_0>Pink Floyd<a1_0/>, David Bowie, Delirious?, Manic Street Preachers, The Killers, The Kaiser Chiefs, Amy Winehouse, Lostprophets, The Midnight Beast, Modestep, and All Time Low. It also hosts classical concerts presented by the <a2_0>Bournemouth Symphony Orchestra<a2_0/>, City of Southampton Orchestra, Southampton Concert Orchestra, <a3_0>Southampton Philharmonic Choir<a3_0/> and Southampton Choral Society.
